scripts.postinstall: cd mobile && npm install && npx patch-package
scripts.setup: npm run setup:api && npm run setup:mobile
scripts.setup:api: cd api && python3 -m venv venv && venv/bin/pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.ios:fresh: rm -rf ios && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf .expo && npm install && npx expo prebuild --platform ios && npx expo run:ios
scripts.ios:rebuild: rm -rf ios && npx expo prebuild --platform ios && npx expo run:ios
